evals.prompt: Got a rejection from Netflix. They said they were looking for someone with dedicated platform engineering experience, not someone transitioning from a CTO role.
evals.expected_output: metadata.json updated: status=rejected, rejection_date=today, rejection_reason=skill_gap: dedicated platform engineering, rejection_insights logged. learning_flags updated. Pattern check performed across all applications. Tracker synced.

evals.prompt: Never heard back from that startup I applied to last month. I followed up twice.
evals.expected_output: Identifies the application (asks if ambiguous). Categorizes as no_response. Updates metadata. Checks if no_response is a recurring pattern. Notes that cold applications may need strategy adjustment if this is the 3rd+ no-response.

evals.prompt: I'm pulling my application from Cognizant. Decided the role isn't the right fit after thinking about it more.
evals.expected_output: metadata.json updated: status=withdrawn, rejection_date=today, rejection_reason=withdrawn: user decided role not right fit. No pattern escalation needed for withdrawals. Tracker synced. Confirmation message.
